query.statement:
SELECT X.CHK, X.ARA, X.ARA_NM, X.BSU, X.BSU_NM, X.PJT, X.HNO, X.SPT_NM, X.HST, X.BLD, X.BLD_NM, MAX(X.FSD) FSD, MAX(X.YDT) YDT, MAX(X.YBN) YBN, MAX(X.YMT) YMT, MAX(X.YON) YON, MAX(X.YDA) YDA, X.GBN, X.SAV, X.SAV_D, X.RMK, X.MYN FROM ( SELECT '' CHK, A.ARA, VALUE(F.CTEXT2,'') ARA_NM, A.BSU, VALUE(G.ABR_NM,'') BSU_NM, A.PJT, A.HNO, VALUE(H.ZSITE_NM,'') SPT_NM, A.HST, A.BLD, VALUE(E.CTEXT2,'') BLD_NM, C.CS143_FSD FSD, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.MANDT,'') > '' THEN VALUE(D.CS115_YDT,'') ELSE REPLACE(CHAR(DATE(SUBSTR(C.CS143_FSD,1,4) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.CS143_FSD,5,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(C.CS143_FSD,7,2)) + 12 MONTH),'-','') END YDT, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS115_YBN,'N') = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END YBN, VALUE(D.CS115_YMT,VALUE(I.DMT,0)) YMT, VALUE(D.CS115_YON,12) YON, VALUE(D.CS115_YDA,VALUE(I.DMT,0)*12) YDA, CASE WHEN A.HST NOT IN ('D','F') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END GBN, VALUE(D.CS115_RMK,'') RMK, CASE WHEN D.CS115_HNO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END SAV, CASE WHEN D.CS115_UDT = '' OR D.CS115_UDT = '00000000' OR D.CS115_UDT IS NULL THEN D.CS115_MDT ELSE D.CS115_UDT END SAV_D, D.CS115_MYN MYN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST115 D ON D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D.CS115_PJT = A.PJT AND D.CS115_HNO = A.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE E ON E.MANDT = A.MANDT AND E.CODE2 = A.BLD AND E.CODE1 = 'CS123' AND E.LANG = #G_LANG# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE F ON F.MANDT = A.MANDT AND F.CODE2 = A.ARA AND F.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND F.LANG = #G_LANG# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 G ON G.MANDT = A.MANDT AND G.LGORT = A.BSU AND G.LGORT > '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 H ON H.MANDT = A.MANDT AND H.POSID = A.PJT LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.BSU_ARA ARA, B.LGORT BSU, A.BLD, CASE WHEN A.SILCNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE DEC(ROUND((A.SILAMT * 100 / A.SILCNT),0)) END DMT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY VKBUR, VKGRP, LIFNR, BLD ORDER BY ZYEAR DESC, ZMON DESC) RNO, ZYEAR, ZMON, LIFNR, BLD, SILAMT, SILCNT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST192 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND VKBUR = 'E500' AND AUART = 'ZR11' AND GBN = 'E' AND KND = '' AND BLD > '' AND ARA > '' ) A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR AND A.RNO = 1 AND B.LGORT > '' ) I ON I.ARA = A.ARA AND I.BSU = A.BSU AND I.BLD = A.BLD, SAPHEE.ZCST144 B, SAPHEE.ZCST143 C, ( SELECT PJT, HNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
EXCEPT
SELECT CS172_PJO PJT, CS172_HNO HNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS172_GBN = 'B' ) J, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PJT = B.CS144_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS144_HNO AND B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.CS144_SEQ = C.CS143_SEQ AND A.PJT = J.PJT AND A.HNO = J.HNO AND A.MANDT = WB.MANDT AND A.BSU = WB.LGORT AND WB.LGORT > '' AND C.CS143_PST = 'A6' AND C.CS143_FSD > '00000000' -- 실패 사유 체크 로직 삭제 201706 최인식 과장 요청 -- AND C.CS143_GBN NOT IN ('M11','U11','U12','U13') AND A.ARA > '' AND A.BSU > ''
AND A.ARA = #ARA#
AND A.BSU = #BSU#
AND A.BPM = #BPM#
AND WB.VKGRP = #TEM#
AND A.PJT = #PJT#
AND A.HST NOT IN ('D','F')
AND A.HST = 'F'
UNION ALL
SELECT '' CHK, A.ARA, VALUE(F.CTEXT2,'') ARA_NM, A.BSU, VALUE(G.ABR_NM,'') BSU_NM, A.PJT, A.HNO, VALUE(H.ZSITE_NM,'') SPT_NM, A.HST, A.BLD, VALUE(E.CTEXT2,'') BLD_NM, '' FSD, VALUE(D.CS115_YDT,'') YDT, CASE WHEN VALUE(D.CS115_YBN,'N') = 'Y' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END YBN, VALUE(D.CS115_YMT,VALUE(I.DMT,0)) YMT, VALUE(D.CS115_YON,12) YON, VALUE(D.CS115_YDA,VALUE(I.DMT,0)*12) YDA, CASE WHEN A.HST NOT IN ('D','F') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END GBN, VALUE(D.CS115_RMK,'') RMK, CASE WHEN D.CS115_HNO IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END SAV, CASE WHEN D.CS115_UDT = '' OR D.CS115_UDT = '00000000' OR D.CS115_UDT IS NULL THEN D.CS115_MDT ELSE D.CS115_UDT END SAV_D, D.CS115_MYN MYN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST115 D ON D.MANDT = A.MANDT AND D.CS115_PJT = A.PJT AND D.CS115_HNO = A.HNO LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE E ON E.MANDT = A.MANDT AND E.CODE2 = A.BLD AND E.CODE1 = 'CS123' AND E.LANG = #G_LANG# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE F ON F.MANDT = A.MANDT AND F.CODE2 = A.ARA AND F.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND F.LANG = #G_LANG# LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZWBT010 G ON G.MANDT = A.MANDT AND G.LGORT = A.BSU AND G.LGORT > '' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 H ON H.MANDT = A.MANDT AND H.POSID = A.PJT LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT B.BSU_ARA ARA, B.LGORT BSU, A.BLD, CASE WHEN A.SILCNT = 0 THEN 0 ELSE DEC(ROUND((A.SILAMT * 100 / A.SILCNT),0)) END DMT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY VKBUR, VKGRP, LIFNR, BLD ORDER BY ZYEAR DESC, ZMON DESC) RNO, ZYEAR, ZMON, LIFNR, BLD, SILAMT, SILCNT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST192 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND VKBUR = 'E500' AND AUART = 'ZR11' AND GBN = 'E' AND KND = '' AND BLD > '' AND ARA > '' ) A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR AND A.RNO = 1 AND B.LGORT > '' ) I ON I.ARA = A.ARA AND I.BSU = A.BSU AND I.BLD = A.BLD, ( SELECT PJT, HNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT#
EXCEPT
SELECT CS172_PJO PJT, CS172_HNO HNO FROM SAPHEE.ZCST172 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS172_GBN = 'B' ) J, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = J.PJT AND A.HNO = J.HNO AND A.MANDT = WB.MANDT AND A.BSU = WB.LGORT AND WB.LGORT > '' AND SUBSTR(A.PJT,1,1) = 'M' AND A.ARA > '' AND A.BSU > ''
AND A.ARA = #ARA#
AND A.BSU = #BSU#
AND A.BPM = #BPM#
AND WB.VKGRP = #TEM#
AND A.PJT = #PJT#
AND A.HST NOT IN ('D','F')
AND A.HST = 'D'
) X WHERE 1=1
AND SUBSTR(X.YDT,1,4) BETWEEN #YEAR1# AND #YEAR2#
AND SUBSTR(X.FSD,1,4) BETWEEN #YEAR3# AND #YEAR4#
GROUP BY X.CHK, X.ARA, X.ARA_NM, X.BSU, X.BSU_NM, X.PJT, X.HNO, X.SPT_NM, X.HST, X.BLD, X.BLD_NM, X.GBN, X.SAV, X.SAV_D, X.RMK, X.MYN ORDER BY X.ARA, X.BSU, X.PJT, X.HNO WITH UR
